title: Got 5 Minutes? Try this 5 Sense Meditation!
author: Will
description: The 5 sense meditation technique is a mindfulness exercise that focuses on paying attention to one sense at a time - hearing, taste, smell, touch & vision.

Take a few minutes and try out this groundig [meditation](https://www.myyogateacher.com/articles/) using your very own senses.
